title: James Forrest hails Neil Lennon impact at Celtic
content:
James Forrest admits it feels like Neil Lennon has never been away after a last-gasp 1-0 win at Dundee on Sunday took Celtic 10 points clear at the top of the Ladbrokes Premiership.

content:

title: Scotland’s Andy Robertson to miss opening Euro 2020 qualifier against Kazakhstan
content:

title: Luciano Spalletti hails Inter Milan bounceback in derby triumph
content:

title: Valverde admits Messi’s brilliance transcends rivalries after Betis ovation
content:

content:

title: Kovac happy as Bayern hit the front again with big win
content:

content:
